    • Constructor Detail

      • ModifiableFont

        ModifiableFont​(java.lang.String fontIdentifier,
               java.lang.String fontFamily,
               int fontStyle,
               int fontSize)
        Modifiable font class constructor. Allows assigning an identifier to the font for the purpose of identifying those Swing components that utilize the font in the event the font's characteristics are changed
        Parameters:
        fontIdentifier - font identifier. The identifier must be unique for each modifiable font since this name is used to identify the font as being used by a particular Swing component. The program preferences key for the modifiable font information is used as the identifier
        fontFamily - font family
        fontStyle - font style
        fontSize - font size

        Modifiable font's identifier
